title: Square Meals
imageCaption: Creative Direction, Brand Identity, Illustrations, Design
description: A culinary collaborative with a conscience, proudly serving New York City's finest organizations
richtext:
Square Meals is an eco-conscious catering company based out of Brooklyn, NY. Its brand promise is to focus on all natural ingredients for daily-prepared meals, at a fair price. This new brand rollout builds off of these principals through a nature-based palette, ingredient-focused iconography, and messaging that reflects the integrity of the business. "Good, to go."
